ShoppingCartAPI.ShoppingCartAPI

Interface ShoppingServices

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShoppingCart

    public interface ShoppingServices
    This class will define the methods of the services that may offer a shopping cart
    Author:
    Diego Alvarez
